content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received a command to google "types of trees in Michigan" and my computer returned a list of search results, including a Michigan.gov website with information on Michigan\'s diverse range of fish, plants, trees, reptiles, amphibians, insects, and mammals. Another result was a Michigan State University website with information on identifying over 75 different native species of trees in the state, as well as a publication that briefly describes 69 of the more common trees found in Michigan. There was also a House Grail article with pictures of the 28 types of trees in Michigan, as well as a Michigan State University news article that helps distinguish between pine, spruce, and fir trees. Additionally, there was a ClickOnDetroit article on how to identify the most common trees in Michigan, as well as a website called arborday.org with a pocket-sized tree identification manual. Finally, there was a Michigan.gov website with information on the best trees to plant to attract backyard wildlife and a website called thetreecenter.com with a guide to buying trees in Michigan. I then requested my computer to read the publication "Identifying Trees of Michigan: E2332 Revised 2022."'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command read_file returned: Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/Identifying_Trees_of_Michigan_E2332_Revised_2022.pdf'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Michigan State University guide to the trees of Michigan pdf"}}}'}]
"""
